title: Sublethal neurotoxicity of saxitoxin in early zebrafish development: Impact on sensorimotor function and neurotransmission systems

Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Beatriz Carnicero, Ricardo Fuentes, Nataly Sanhueza, Humberto Mattos, Constanza Aguirre-Campos, David Contreras, Eduardo Troncoso, Juan Pablo Henríquez, Sebastián Boltaña
